column1: Scaramucci: Culture of fear inside White House
column2: Former White House Communications Director Anthony Scaramucci says there is a "culture of fear" inside the White House and predicts more staff departures.

column1: Girls braving the cold to meet 5 Seconds of Summer
column2: Girls describe waiting 12 hours to see Australian boyband 5 Seconds of Summer.

column1: It's snowing - can I refuse to go to work?
column2: What are your legal rights if the weather means you are unable to make it into work?

column1: Scenes of chaos as girls scrambled to escape Boko Haram capture
column2: A clock ticking in a deserted dorm room. A solitary slipper strewn across the red earth. A girl's headscarf on the grass, rippling in the breeze.

column1: Westminster crash: Raids after suspected terror attack
column2: Searches take place in Birmingham and Nottingham as a man is held after a crash outside Parliament.

column1: Russian spy: Military deployed after Russian spy poisoning
column2: Service personnel will help remove contaminated items, as ex-spy and his daughter remain critical.
